title: Breathe: 31 Moments with God for Moms
description: Breathe: 31 Moments with God {for Moms} provides needed encouragement and spiritual refreshment for busy moms. Author Jaimie Bowman takes weary mothers through a 31 day journey of reconnecting with the Lord and renewing peace and joy in their mothering journeys.
author: Jaimie Bowman
